Curator's Notes.notes: Archguns are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archmelees are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archwings are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Companions are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

AIOAsh.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Rathuum | Void Fissures |
AIOAsh.notes: Ash's armor removal and/or bypass makes it so that not a lot of Strength is needed as long as abilities are spammed consistently.

AIOAtlas.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
AIOAtlas.notes: Landslide has decent damage caling but is held back by relative inability to deal with armor past the starchart. Nonetheless the raw damage is sufficient to deal with Sortie-level enemies.

SilenceBanshee.notes: Silence can be used to stagger keep enemies unalerted for the stealth affinity bonus.

SonarBanshee.suitableMissionsRanked: | Capture | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Void Fissures |
SonarBanshee.notes: Sonar's effects can overlap onto the same spot, adding multipliers to a current multiplier.

QuakeBanshee.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
QuakeBanshee.notes: Augmented Soundquake has decent map-clearing potential but is limited by it's relative inability to deal with armor past starchart levels.

AIOBaruuk.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Solo | Survival |
AIOBaruuk.notes: Baruuk's kit work in unison by evading attacks while not attacking himself, sleeping his enemies, and easily maintainable 90% damage reduction, he can hardly be killed. Serene Storm can be activated once some Restraint is eroded, but is ultimately underpowered compared to other exalted weaponry despite being easily maintained.

CCBaruuk.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Solo | Survival |
CCBaruuk.notes: Long duration Lull can easily lock down an entire map and effictively stall the mission until the timer runs out.

TankChroma.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo |
TankChroma.notes: 9/10 Eidolon Hunters recommend Chroma. The last one uses something else but secretly wishes that his riven and his build is up to snuff.

BuffChroma.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo |
BuffChroma.notes: Would have been top, but since teaming up would assume some form of coordination it is expected that the Chroma stay a little more still and teammates gather around him for warmth instead.

LootChroma.notes: Faster and easier to farm credits in Index. Orb mother fights doesn't use this build either.

BuffEmber.suitableMissionsRanked: | Capture | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Void Fissures |
BuffEmber.notes: Would have been top if there is a mission where Fire damage matters because the bonus damage is pretty insane. Buff your teammates with Fireball Frenzy and Accelerant. Fire Blast can be stacked indefinitely to add 50% Fire damage each time.

WoFEmber.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
WoFEmber.notes: Shrinking range hinders actual usability of World on Fire.

SleepEquinox.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | Interception | Mobile Defense |
SleepEquinox.notes: One of the best sleep abilities. Can also be used for rapid solo affinity farm on weapons and focus by stacking the stealth combo counter.

MaimEquinox.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
MaimEquinox.notes: One of the few endgame scaling AOE damage abilities. Becomes exponentially more powerful with a coordinated team of damage buff and another similarly built Equinox.

ProvokeEquinox.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Survival | Void Fissures |
ProvokeEquinox.notes: Buff your teammates' Power Strength while debuffing enemies with damage amp with Day aspect. Or you can switch to defensive debuff on the enemies with the Night aspect, which does count the excess efficiency.

IndexExcalibur.notes: Unique interactions (bonus aura and weapon ammo) makes Umbra specter really good at killing enemies in Index when equipped with a relatively ammo-inefficient but powerful weapon like Kohm. Since Umbra will not use any abilities while enemies are not in range of it, reducing Range to minimum will ensure that he focuses only on firing the weapon to devastating effect.

EBExcalibur.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
EBExcalibur.notes: The best exalted melee in game. Each Augmented Slash Dash provides multiple additions to the combo counter and will excessively increase damage output. Best used with [Drifting Contact] on the EB and Naramon school.

BubbleFrost.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
BubbleFrost.notes: Very few other frames excel at preventing a static objective from being shot at.

CCFrost.buildGoals: neuDUR hiEFF maxRAN sacSTR + aug2opt aug3
CCFrost.notes: Delay-based build for covering large areas with crowd control. A large snowglobe can cover interception points indefinitely while Augmented Ice Wave will keep other enemies slowed down.

NukeFrost.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Solo | Survival |
NukeFrost.notes: Despite having a protective coating you can still build up [Adaptation] stacks, which is great for survivability.

NukeGara.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
NukeGara.notes: Another highly scaling AOE damage ability as Mass Vitrify's explosion damage is derived from Shattered Lash which in turn draws damage from melee mods. This makes maxing out range easier compared with other builds. However, the nuke is relatively complex and a properly built statstick is necessary.

AIOGara.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival | Void Fissures |
AIOGara.notes: This build is more focused on a long duration Splinter Storm with high range to create a walking aura of damage that can trivialize most content once the damage is properly built up. A proper statstick is necessary.

ShieldGara.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival |
ShieldGara.notes: 90% damage reduction is very good for when a specific mobile objective needs to be protected at all costs. Since Splinter Storm is refreshable this build is more suitable for buff-and-forget instead.

AIOGaruda.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
AIOGaruda.notes: Combining her 1 and 3 means you can survive any attacks unless you get hit by nullifiers or forget to refresh the duration while having nearly +100% damage.

HealerGaruda.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
HealerGaruda.notes: Creating 3 altars to keep a semi-static team alive is great especially when healing is scarce.

AIOHarrow.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
AIOHarrow.notes: It's really hard to build Harrow wrong (and therefore hard to build him perfectly), especially since his entire kit works in unison and therefore requires different stats to work together. One of the preferred proc prevention frames in Eidolon hunting.

SuperHildryn.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
SuperHildryn.notes: One of the few frames that require arcanes to really shine, since Arcane Aegis' regeneration won't be canceled by damage to shields. This allows for relatively unlimited usage of abilities as well as survivability.

BudgetHildryn.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
BudgetHildryn.notes: The poor man's Hildryn build is still viable but requires no arcanes if a shield regenerating weapon is used while spamming Shield Pillage.

LootHydroid.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Survival | Void Fissures |
LootHydroid.notes: Puddle first then charge up the Tentacles to double up the loot. Works very well with a Zenistar for relatively pain-free material and mod farming.

PuddleHydroid.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assault | Defection | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Survival |
PuddleHydroid.notes: Curative Undertow build for healing teammates.

TankInaros.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
TankInaros.notes: One of the few frames that require arcanes to really shine, since with a little health regeneration Inaros is pretty much unkillable even when surrounded by active nullifiers.

SleepIvara.notes: The most reliable way to max out a weapon on a single run. Higher strength to increase the headshot multiplier from Prowl. Sleep arrow can reset alert status an enemy no matter the condition.

AIOIvara.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Index | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Solo | Sorties |
AIOIvara.notes: Artemis Bow's has great stats and high innate multishot making it excellent at boss-killing as long as AOE attacks can be dealt with. Strength scaling affects Augmented Dashwire and Artemis Bow.

CCIvara.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | Interception | Mobile Defense |
CCIvara.notes: Using Noise Arrow and Sleep Arrow to indefinitely delay a mission. Noise Arrows will eventually break the AI and turn them completely unalerted, allowing you to clear a mission without further interference.

ProwlIvara.buildGoals: Balanced maxEFF neuDUR + aug3 + Roll speed
ProwlIvara.notes: Great for dealing with pesky Corpus spy rooms until you've mastered the patterns. Can also be used for Prowl farming some enemies but there are faster farming methods. However, Prowl-pickpocketing Life Support from enemies to fulfill the no-kill survival Riven challenge is possible.

AIOKhora.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Mobile Defense | Void Fissures |
AIOKhora.notes: Stacking damage from whipclaw's Augment is more than enough to counteract a slightly lowered power strength.

CataLimbo.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
CataLimbo.notes: When a build only has nullifiers as its weakness, you know it's good. Stay in Rift, press 2, aim at obj and press 4. Repeat. Change range depending on existence of nullifiers in mission.

LootLimbo.notes: Press 4 twice to break any boxes within range so that you can easily see Syndicate Medallion or Caches in the minimap.

SurgeLimbo.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Mobile Defense | Void Fissures |
SurgeLimbo.notes: Same usage as Cataclysm, except this time you also press 3 and then banish enemies that have been affected by Rift Surge. Damage scaling is absurd if many enemies are caught in the effect.

BanishLimbo.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defection | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Rescue | Rescue | Sorties |
BanishLimbo.notes: While in normal plane, send allies into the rift to heal them. Makes Defections or any missions where you need to keep an Operative alive a breeze.

SwitchTPLoki.notes: Extremely good at moving mobile objectives like POE drones closer to the objective.

StealthLoki.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
StealthLoki.notes: Very useful for rushing through missions with Loki's high innate speed.

DisarmLoki.notes: One of the highest ranged disarm abilities in game. Adding the Augment delays the enemies from being able to act effectively against the objective even more.

BubbleMag.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
BubbleMag.notes: Run in, disarm and bubble one enemy. Shoot  the bubble with a projectile weapon and let the damage commence. Aug3 helps with surviability, as well as [Adaptation] as Mag's Crush can gain overshields.

AIOMesa.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Void Fissures |
AIOMesa.notes: Shatter Shield can redirect up to 95% of an enemy's ranged attack. Mesa's Peacemakers are best modded for fire speed and forgoing [Hornet Strike] due to how it interacts with Power Strength. Damage can ramp up to extreme levels but it's inability to target weakspots will hamper usefulness against certain VIPs.

EidolonMesa.notes: Shooting Gallery can uniquely increase Operator's Amp damage.

EclipseMirage.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Survival | Void Fissures |
EclipseMirage.notes: Buff your teammates with multiplicative weapon damage. Might have some issues with identifying bright areas during mobile missions, but is one of the highest damage amplification abilities. Eclipse also increases Scanners' speed.

MurderMirage.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
MurderMirage.notes: Extreme weapon damage amp would have been great if Mirage isn't a total pushover. Doppelganger shots can also proc status despite having lower damage than the main so build your weapons accordingly.

PrismMirage.notes: Blind would have been good if LoS is not needed for the crowd control.

NukeMirage.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
NukeMirage.notes: Explosive Legerdemain turns all ammo pickups into proximity mines that will explode for signficant damage once stacked. A Nekros or Hydroid in the team to increase the number of pickups increasese the damage potential.

LootNekros.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Mobile Defense | Survival |
LootNekros.notes: Desecrate can almost double your loot if accompanied with an appropriate loadout of dismembering weapons. Shield of Shadows can create a buffer between enemies and an objective semi-reliably. When all else fails, Terrify will get rid of the remaining enemies.

AIONezha.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Defection | Defense | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
AIONezha.notes: Truly the Jack of all Trades but Master of None, Nezha's entire kit synergizes well together but requires different stats. Using Warding Halo to protect yourself or allies while utilizing Chakram on enemies affected by Divine Spears to force another Chakram out.

ChakramNezha.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
ChakramNezha.notes: Chakram's damage multiplier is applied as a debuff on enemies after all other damage is calculated. Drawback is the limit on how many enemies it can affect and some VIPs immunity to debuffs.

DelayNezha.notes: With a base duration of 12 seconds, Divine Spears can keep a sufficiently large area locked down for a long time when modded properly. Does not work as a stealth farm tool as it alerts enemies.

NukeNezha.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
NukeNezha.notes: Divine Spears have a decent enough damage to last the starchart. Fixed damage and inabillity to deal with armor hampers the scaling.

LinkNidus.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
LinkNidus.notes: By far the biggest Power Strength buff you can get in game. Parasitic Link is slightly limited as it can only amplify one Ally and requires the teammate to build appropriately.

TankNidus.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
TankNidus.notes: Linking to an enemy can grant up to 90% damage reduction, which makes Nidus nigh invincible considering his natural stats.

StompNidus.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
StompNidus.notes: Virulence is very strong when stacks are up, but takes too much time to ramp up for quicker missions.

SpeedNova.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
SpeedNova.notes: No other abilities grant both double damage and an increase in enemy speed with so much coverage. One of the few actual use case for [Power Donation]. Augment compensates for Nova's poor survivability.

SlowNova.notes: No other abilities grant both double damage and a decrease in enemy speed with so much coverage. Augment compensates for Nova's poor survivability.

PortalNova.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Defection | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
PortalNova.notes: Impressive speed when mastered while also being able to move POE drones along. Also consider lowering range for smaller/tighter maps.

AMDNova.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
AMDNova.notes: Augmented Antimatter Drop can be used to block enemy weapon fire and bypasses terrain. Drawback of needing to charge the ball and fixed range of subsequent explosion limits this ability.

ChaosNyx.notes: Extremely useful for completely stalling a mission's timer. Advantage compared to Loki's Irradiating Disarm is that enemies will also shoot nullifier bubbles. Augment is useful but it is often easier to just recast.

BubbleNyx.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
BubbleNyx.notes: Can be used defensively to protect an objective from being harmed, but limited to smaller objectives. Raised threat level also forces enemies to redirect fire to you but is not as good as other defensive barrier abilities.

HealerOberon.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
HealerOberon.notes: Defensive babysitter build mostly for keeping allies and opertives alive. Augmented 3 provides instant revive every 90s which is useful for glass cannon frames.

EidolonOberon.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Drone Hijack | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
EidolonOberon.notes: Eidolon Hunter build. Augmented Smite buff on allies can be used to great effect as Eidolons are weak to Radiation.

NukeOberon.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
NukeOberon.notes: AOE nuking and armor removal build. Laying down Hallowed Grounds and casting Reckoning twice completely removes armor.

StealthOctavia.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
StealthOctavia.notes: Octavia's unique and refreshable invisibility can be managed to 100% uptime while maintaining full mobility. The buff can be applied across the team with some coordination.

MalletOctavia.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Void Fissures |
MalletOctavia.notes: Mallet is the only Warframe ability that is effective against Nullifiers. Amp doubles the range and can cover the entire room in a Defense mission.

BuffOctavia.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
BuffOctavia.notes: Team buff build that is both high in utility and damage potential. A viable option for Eidolon Hunting although not recommended as Octavia would not survive the AOE damage. The Opera effect from Metronome also affects Scanners' speed.

AIORevenant.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
AIORevenant.notes: Revenant's kit grants him both offensive and defensive capabilities at the cost of some mobility.

SoloRhino.buildGoals: lowDUR hiEFF neuRAN maxSTR + aug1 aug2
SoloRhino.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Hijack | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
SoloRhino.notes: An all-rounded build that utilises most of Rhino's offensive and defensive abilities. Ironclad Charge scales better than [Steel Fibre] even if you just hit two enemies.

BuffRhino.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
BuffRhino.notes: Roar scales after weapon damage mods and is one of the best damage buff to you and your allies. Range can be reduced in a coordinated team. One of the DPS-enhancing options for an Eidolon hunt.

StompRhino.notes: A unique build for crowd control. Enemies are thrown into the air for the duration and will enter knockdown-like state after. Enemies stuck in the air will remain unalerted and this makes the stealth focus farm in exterminate maps possible.

ESOSaryn.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
ESOSaryn.notes: Saryn has high range for Spores and Miasma. Enemies that die from sources other than Spore also spread it outwards with increasing damage.

MeleeSaryn.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
MeleeSaryn.notes: Turn Saryn into a melee platform by spreading 3 status effects to jumpstart [Condition Overload]. Toxic Lash bursts all spores for re-application and each spore burst adds to the combo counter.

AIOTitania.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Eidolon Hunt | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage |
AIOTitania.notes: Dex Pixia has great damage potential but Razorwing disables companion abilities and Titania herself has limited survivability. Debuffing enemies with her other abilites will trigger the Augment and increase her Fire Rate and Movement Speed. Titania is one of the best frames for killing Plague Star's boss due to Dex Pixia's mechanics.

EVTrinity.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | FR-Assassinate | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Hijack | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
EVTrinity.notes: No other frames give the team as much energy as fast as an EV Trinity. Augment also adds Overshields and is a viable case for survivability when stacked with [Adaptation].

BlessTrinity.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Rescue | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival |
BlessTrinity.notes: Within affinity range, heal teammates to full health and provide 75% damage resistance. No other frames can come close to the speed of the heal. Very useful for keeping Eidolon Lures alive.

LinkTrinity.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
LinkTrinity.notes: Abating Link removes all armor from enemies and redirect the damage to them. Combine with Blessing to gain high survivability.

MeleeValkyr.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
MeleeValkyr.notes: Valkyr excels as a melee platform due to her innate stats and the bonus from Warcry that is easily maintained by the Augment.

CCVauban.notes: Vauban offers massive crowd control across the map, but little else.

ESOVolt.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
ESOVolt.notes: One of the few top ESO farming frames. Duration maintains Discharge's effects on enemies and thus increases DPS. Augmented Discharge can gain Overshield which synergizes with [Adaptation] for even greater survivability.

EidolonVolt.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
EidolonVolt.notes: Good for defending a specific objective or Eidolon hunting. Angle up to three Electric Shields around an objective to prevent any gunfire to it.

SpeedVolt.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
SpeedVolt.notes: Volt's Speed is an easily applied buff to the team. Very useful for speedrunning any content.

NukeWukong.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
NukeWukong.notes: While the Glaive and Exodia Contagion AoE has been nerfed, the damage bonus is significant enough to take out a small group of sortie-level enemies despite the lowered range.

CloudWukong.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
CloudWukong.notes: Cloud Walker can be used to bypass certain Spy vaults' security completely and provide immunity from any attacks.

TailWindZephyr.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Spy | Survival |
TailWindZephyr.notes: Tail Wind is very useful for traversing large maps without the use of an Archwing Launcher.

TurbZephyr.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
TurbZephyr.notes: Turbulence redirects any gunfire away from Zephyr. The Augment increases Projectile Flight Speed and therefore makes arrows fly straighter and increases the range before shotguns' falloff.

TornadoZephyr.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
TornadoZephyr.notes: Fire into Tornados to increase their damage. Tornados also rapidly re-apply status effects on the victims and is a prime candidate for Gas or Corrosive. Trying to control the summoned tornados, however, is like herding cats so good luck with that.

Zaw - Mah-alleinir.wepnotes: High damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Rabvee, Shtung, and Ekwana II Jai zaw.

Zaw - Non Timetis Messor.name: Scythe Zaw - Non Timetis Messor
Zaw - Non Timetis Messor.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Plague Keewar, Korb, and Ekwana II Jai zaw.

Zaw - Ulfberht.name: Machete Zaw - Ulfberht
Zaw - Ulfberht.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Rabvee, Korb, and Vargeet II Ruhang zaw.

Amprex.name: Amprex
Amprex.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. Beam chains to nearby enemies giving it decent AOE.

Arca Plasmor.name: Arca Plasmor
Arca Plasmor.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Single pellet is wide with punchthrough and therefore can act as AOE and reliably proc status effects. Does not have a headshot multiplier.

Argonak.name: Argonak
Argonak.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Scoping highlights enemies for easier targetting. Alternate between semi-auto (higher DPS) and full-auto (higher fire rate) to deal with different enemies. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Astilla.name: Astilla
Astilla.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Deals 30% of damage upon impact and 70% on explosion.

Attica.name: Attica
Attica.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Battacor.name: Battacor
Battacor.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Primary fire has two-round burst which is potentially wasteful. Every kill gives one secondary fire charge. Up to three charges can be stored for greater damage and crit chance. Recommend to expend secondary fire as soon as possible as it is a free shot and would increase overall DPS.

Baza.name: Baza
Baza.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Completely silent but has damage falloff similar to shotguns.

Boar Prime.name: Boar Prime
Boar Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Required to mod for 100% status chance.

Boltor Prime.name: Boltor Prime
Boltor Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Braton Prime.name: Braton Prime
Braton Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions.

Burston Prime.name: Burston Prime
Burston Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Gilded Truth (Arbiters of Hexis) increases fire rate and provide Truth effect (Gas, health, parkour).

Buzlok.name: Buzlok
Buzlok.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire launches tracer beacon which gives additive 50% Crit Chance (20 seconds) that remain active even the target is dead. Has insane DPS potential but difficult to attain due to difficulty in handling beacon and relatively poor handling. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Cernos Prime.name: Cernos Prime
Cernos Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire toggles firing pattern between horizontal and vertical (+50% headshot damage).

Convectrix.name: Convectrix
Convectrix.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions. Primary fire brings the beam from wide to narrow while alt fire sweeps the beam. Alt fire sweeps the beam from narrow to wide instead and is useful for applying status effects to large crowds. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Corinth.name: Corinth
Corinth.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt fire is useful when the reload button is harder to reach than the secondary fire button. Reload should be done when clip is empty as there is a delay between reloading and firing, but the gains should be minimal.

Daikyu.name: Daikyu
Daikyu.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Dera Vandal.name: Dera Vandal
Dera Vandal.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Drakgoon.name: Drakgoon
Drakgoon.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Dread.name: Dread
Dread.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Exergis.name: Exergis
Exergis.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions.

Ferrox.name: Ferrox
Ferrox.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Munition shot the moment it is fully charged. Alt fire should be used to reduce reliance on primary weapons.

Flux Rifle.name: Flux Rifle
Flux Rifle.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions.

Glaxion.name: Glaxion
Glaxion.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Harpak.name: Harpak
Harpak.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Alt fire launches a harpoon can be used to drag enemies closer. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Hema.name: Hema
Hema.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Heals warframe on headshots. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Hind.name: Hind
Hind.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt fire has better DPS on paper but due to low fire rate it still doesn't do enough.

Ignis Wraith.name: Ignis Wraith
Ignis Wraith.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. AOE works like how you'd imagine an actual flamethrower would.

Javlok.name: Javlok
Javlok.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creats a localized explosion. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Karak Wraith.name: Karak Wraith
Karak Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Kohm.name: Kohm
Kohm.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Spool up increases bullets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs as well as having insane innate punchthrough. Riven disposition is relatively high for DPS potential and can help reach 100% status chance. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Lanka.name: Lanka
Lanka.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Chance (20%/30%/50%). Innate Electric damage and high direct damage potential makes the Lanka the choice weapon for Eidolon hunting.

Latron Prime.name: Latron Prime
Latron Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions.

Latron Wraith.name: Latron Wraith
Latron Wraith.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Lenz.name: Lenz
Lenz.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Each arrow procs procs Impact on direct hit, Cold AOE immediately afterwards, and finally Blast AOE explosion.

Miter.name: Miter
Miter.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Neutralizing Justice can instantly destroy nullifier bubbles and has Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Mutalist Cernos.name: Mutalist Cernos
Mutalist Cernos.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Fully charged arrows leave a gas trail that continues to proc status effects. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Mutalist Quanta.name: Mutalist Quanta
Mutalist Quanta.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creats a bubble that can be combined up to three times. Firing through the bubble increase damage and critical chance.

Nagantaka.name: Nagantaka
Nagantaka.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Headshots have a chance to increase reload speed. Secondary fire empties clip with little additional recoil and is highly recommended.

Ogris.name: Ogris
Ogris.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Nightwatch Napalm turns the Ogris into an area denial weapon. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Opticor.name: Opticor
Opticor.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Do not stare directly into beam. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Opticor Vandal.name: Opticor Vandal
Opticor Vandal.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,

Panthera.name: Panthera
Panthera.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt-fire puts a spinning blade a few meters in from of the weapon that constantly spin and deal damage.

Paracyst.name: Paracyst
Paracyst.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Paris Prime.name: Paris Prime
Paris Prime.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Phage.name: Phage
Phage.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, beam munitions. Scoping narrows down the beam to a single point.

Phantasma.name: Phantasma
Phantasma.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. Primary fire has usable AOE. Alt fire charges the weapon to fire an exploding glob that also releases seeking projectiles. Longer charge imparts more damage.

Prisma Gorgon.name: Prisma Gorgon
Prisma Gorgon.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Roll for recoil reduction in riven.

Prisma Grakata.name: Prisma Grakata
Prisma Grakata.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions.

Prisma Grinlok.name: Prisma Grinlok
Prisma Grinlok.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Augment adds 200% CC and Sequence (Radiation, Shields, Max Shields)

Prisma Tetra.name: Prisma Tetra
Prisma Tetra.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Quanta Vandal.name: Quanta Vandal
Quanta Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, beam munitions. Could do with punchthrough but build is tight as it is. Alt fire useful to learn Euclidean geometry.

Quartakk.name: Quartakk
Quartakk.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Four-shot burst is wasteful at times.

Rakta Cernos.name: Rakta Cernos
Rakta Cernos.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Good syndicate proc (Viral + energy restore) but doesn't do much for DPS since effective fire-rate for bows are low.

Rubico Prime.name: Rubico Prime
Rubico Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is amazing (min. 1), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Multiplier (35%/50%). High direct damage potential and smooth handling makes Rubico Prime a popular choice for Eidolon Hunting.

Sancti Tigris.name: Sancti Tigris
Sancti Tigris.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Purity (Corrosive, health) effect can be useful. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creates a localized bullet attractor field on nearby enemies' head.

Secura Penta.name: Secura Penta
Secura Penta.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Napalm Grenades adds 30% Status Chance (not affected by other mods) and causes instant explosions while leaving a burning patch on the ground.

Snipetron Vandal.name: Snipetron Vandal
Snipetron Vandal.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is average (min. 3), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (30%/50%).

Sobek.name: Sobek
Sobek.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Shattering Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) can make it reach 100% status chance while Acid Shells can be used to provide some AOE damage.

Soma Prime.name: Soma Prime
Soma Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Best paired with Frost Prime and Scindo Prime.

Stradavar Prime.name: Stradavar Prime
Stradavar Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Can alternate between semi-auto (better DPS) and full-auto (useful for breaking nullifier bubbles). Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Strun Wraith.name: Strun Wraith
Strun Wraith.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Required to mod for 100% status chance.

Supra Vandal.name: Supra Vandal
Supra Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Entropy Burst (Magnetic, Energy) can greatly increase status chance.

Sybaris Prime.name: Sybaris Prime
Sybaris Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Two-round burst is wasteful at times and the magazine is relatively small for how fast it fires.

Synapse.name: Synapse
Synapse.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions.

Synoid Simulor.name: Synoid Simulor
Synoid Simulor.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Telos Boltor.name: Telos Boltor
Telos Boltor.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) syndicate proc is helpful at times.

Tenora.name: Tenora
Tenora.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Has a decent alt-fire that can be used to take down medium units quickly. Light units and heavy units should still be dealt with using primary fire.

Tiberon Prime.name: Tiberon Prime
Tiberon Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt-fire toggles between 3-round burst, semi-auto, and auto. Testing so far shows that burst fire has 5% edge on DPS compared to semi-auto at the expense of ammo economy.

Tigris Prime.name: Tigris Prime
Tigris Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Required to mod for 100% status chance. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Tonkor.name: Tonkor
Tonkor.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Grenades can cause self damage. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Torid.name: Torid
Torid.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Thing fired stick on surfaces/targets and continue to emit gas that deals damage and causes status effects.

Vaykor Hek.name: Vaykor Hek
Vaykor Hek.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects can be useful.

Vectis Prime.name: Vectis Prime
Vectis Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is slow (min. 5), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%).

Veldt.name: Veldt
Veldt.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt-fire toggles higher magnification on zoom.

Vulkar Wraith.name: Vulkar Wraith
Vulkar Wraith.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%/70%).

Zarr.name: Zarr
Zarr.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. First explosion from primary fire can damage self but subsequent cluster bomblets won't. Each bomblet can cause status effect on it's own. Alt fire switches to shotgun mode. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Zenith.name: Zenith
Zenith.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Secondary fire launches a disc that scans enemies and switches the weapon to semi-auto. Semi-auto mode has more DPS and infinite punchthrough.

Zhuge.name: Zhuge
Zhuge.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Curator's Notes.notes: Schools are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

Acrid.name: Acrid
Acrid.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Each flechette delivers toxin DoT (scales with modified base damage and toxin damage) regardless of elemental modding.

Afuris.name: Afuris
Afuris.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Akbolto Prime.name: Akbolto Prime
Akbolto Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Keep your friends close; keep your enemies closer. Because bolts have travel time.

Akbronco Prime.name: Akbronco Prime
Akbronco Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Akjagara Prime.name: Akjagara Prime
Akjagara Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions.

Aklato.name: Aklato
Aklato.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Aklex Prime.name: Aklex Prime
Aklex Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS. Suffers from poor consistency.

Akmagnus.name: Akmagnus
Akmagnus.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Aksomati.name: Aksomati
Aksomati.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions.

Akstiletto Prime.name: Akstiletto Prime
Akstiletto Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Very good all-rounder secondary.

Akvasto Prime.name: Akvasto Prime
Akvasto Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Akzani.name: Akzani
Akzani.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Arca Scisco.name: Arca Scisco
Arca Scisco.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Each shot landed grants Target Analysis buff. Target Analysis stacks up to 5 times, lasting 2 seconds each. Critical Chance and Status Chance increases by 4% per stack.

Atomos.name: Atomos
Atomos.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Chains 7m away, even when shooting at dead bodies.

Azima.name: Azima
Azima.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Alt fire launches the remaining clip that will act as a 4-point dumb turret.

Ballistica Prime.name: Ballistica Prime
Ballistica Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Charged shot kills turns the target into a ghostly specter for 7 seconds.

Brakk.name: Brakk
Brakk.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. RIP Raids.

Bronco Prime.name: Bronco Prime
Bronco Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Cycron.name: Cycron
Cycron.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  beam munitions. Does not have an ammo reserve. Ammo in clip regenerates over time when not firing.

Despair.name: Despair
Despair.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions.

Dex Furis.name: Dex Furis
Dex Furis.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Despite being called the Furis, it uses the Afuris riven. Suffers from poor consistency.

Dual Toxocyst.name: Dual Toxocyst
Dual Toxocyst.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Headshot grants Frenzy buff. Frenzy lasts 3 seconds and can be refreshed. Frenzy grants 100% increase in Toxin damage (on base damage), 15% increase in fire rate, recoil reduction, and doesn't consume ammo while firing. Suffers from poor consistency.

Embolist.name: Embolist
Embolist.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  beam munitions.

Euphona Prime.name: Euphona Prime
Euphona Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Alt-fire switches to multi-pellet mode that can achieve 100% status chance when modded properly. However, slug mode firing has superior DPS and hybrid modding will gimp both builds.

Fusilai.name: Fusilai
Fusilai.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Alt-fire launches three throwing knives horizontally instead.

Hikou Prime.name: Hikou Prime
Hikou Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions.

Hystrix.name: Hystrix
Hystrix.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Bolts munitions have pros and cons. Clip is small for fire rate and despite quick reload will end up being annoying. Alt-fire changes elemental damage to one of four basic types (Fire, Ice, Poison, Electricity) with guaranteed procs which scales more if corresponding elemental mod is installed.

Knell.name: Knell
Knell.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Headshot grants Death Knell buff. Death Knell can stack up to 3 times, lasting 3 seconds per stack. Stack-count regardless, 20% status chance and infinite ammo is granted. Critical Multiplier increases (x1.5, x2., x2.5) per stack.

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Kulstar.name: Kulstar
Kulstar.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Rocket impact will release 3 additional bomblets. Suffers from poor consistency.

Kunai.name: Kunai
Kunai.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Good luck landing a precise shot.

Lato Vandal.name: Lato Vandal
Lato Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Lex Prime.name: Lex Prime
Lex Prime.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS.

Mara Detron.name: Mara Detron
Mara Detron.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions.

Nukor.name: Nukor
Nukor.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  beam munitions. Hitting a specific part multiple times increases damage dealt to that part by 5%. Unusually, Nukor has very high Critical Multiplier but poor Critical Chance, hence it's DPS increase from flat Crit Chance modifiers is relatively higher than other weapons.

Ocucor.name: Ocucor
Ocucor.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Each enemy killed will create an additional tendril that damages other targettable enemies in sight. Tendrils reset upon reloading.

Pandero.name: Pandero
Pandero.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Alt-fire empties clip onto enemy with some worrying recoil.

Plinx.name: Plinx
Plinx.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Pox.name: Pox
Pox.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Firing launches gas darts that will fill a moderate AOE with gas. Modding 100% status is highly recommended. Suffers from poor consistency.

Prisma Angstrum.name: Prisma Angstrum
Prisma Angstrum.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Multishot causes the rocket to spread out further. Can be charged to launch more rockets at once. Suffers from poor consistency.

Prisma Twin Gremlins.name: Prisma Twin Gremlins
Prisma Twin Gremlins.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions.

Pyrana Prime.name: Pyrana Prime
Pyrana Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Killing 3 enemies within 3 seconds summons another Pyrana Prime for 5 seconds, which doubles your fire rate and current ammo (of which up to 12 remains after it is gone).

Rakta Ballistica.name: Rakta Ballistica
Rakta Ballistica.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) is useful at times. Suffers from poor consistency.

Sancti Castanas.name: Sancti Castanas
Sancti Castanas.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Purity (Corrosive, health) can be useful at times. Suffers from poor consistency.

Secura Dual Cestra.name: Secura Dual Cestra
Secura Dual Cestra.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Sequence (Radiation, shields) can be useful at times.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions.

Sicarus Prime.name: Sicarus Prime
Sicarus Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Sonicor.name: Sonicor
Sonicor.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. The tenno space program has been replaced by the tenno ragdoll simulator. Explosions may cause status effects. Suffers from poor consistency.

Spectra.name: Spectra
Spectra.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  beam munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Spira Prime.name: Spira Prime
Spira Prime.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions.

Staticor.name: Staticor
Staticor.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Bolt and resulting explosion has independent chance to proc status effects, making it highly capable of stripping armor.

Stubba.name: Stubba
Stubba.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Stug.name: Stug
Stug.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Each shot launches a blob. Up to six blobs can accumulate at a single site on the target. Alt-fire charges the weapon to launch a single, larger blob. While the shots itself does not cause status effects, the blobs do.

Synoid Gammacor.name: Synoid Gammacor
Synoid Gammacor.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Innate Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) is useful at times.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Telos Akbolto.name: Telos Akbolto
Telos Akbolto.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) is useful at times.

Twin Grakatas.name: Twin Grakatas
Twin Grakatas.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Twin Kohmak.name: Twin Kohmak
Twin Kohmak.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Spool up increases pellets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs. Suffers from poor consistency.

Twin Rogga.name: Twin Rogga
Twin Rogga.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions.

Twin Vipers Wraith.name: Twin Vipers Wraith
Twin Vipers Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Tysis.name: Tysis
Tysis.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Vasto Prime.name: Vasto Prime
Vasto Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Vaykor Marelok.name: Vaykor Marelok
Vaykor Marelok.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Justice (Blast, health, armor) can be helpful at times.

Viper Wraith.name: Viper Wraith
Viper Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Zakti.name: Zakti
Zakti.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Pellets explode after landing, causing Impact status and Gas damage and status. Suffers from poor consistency.

Zylok.name: Zylok
Zylok.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise.name: Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise
Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Catchmoon-Gibber-Splat kitgun. Base version without use of arcanes. No testing to be done with Pax Seeker as use case does not justify headshots (lined up target punchthrough and no headshot multiplier). Suffers from poor consistency.

Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Cha.name: Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Charge)
Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Cha.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Catchmoon-Haymaker-Zipneedle kitgun. R3 Pax Charge.

Gaze - Baleful Purifier.base: Pax Charge requires specialized build (Gaze-Haymaker-Zipneedle) but performs at Contender tier.

Curator's Notes.notes: Sentinel Weapons are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

frame.text: Frames are currently being redone. Please be patient as that part of the list is worked on.

checkTheLinks.text: Please refer to the Weapon name links for Zaws and Kitguns. Also click on the builds' link to see it.

subjectivity.name: subjectivity
subjectivity.text: This is a partially subjective tier list, however constructive criticism is always encouraged and appreciated. Before you freak out about a weapon's tier, read this disclaimer by /u/4G3NT_0R4NGE3. Nevertheless, this guide is intended to get a general sense of the equipment in the game.

ordering.name: ordering
ordering.text: Ordering of weapons are significant with the implementation of robust testing regiment. However, for Top tiered weapons (and some Contenders) they are somewhat crowded and differences could sometimes be down to less than 5% in performance.

workSoFar.name: workSoFar
workSoFar.text: Only Primary, Secondary, and Melee weapons have been thoroughly rated. Warframes are not ranked within a tier and represent their respective power considering the current meta but going from Top to Contender and then to Viable does signify reduced capabilites and/or importance.

wepBuilds.name: wepBuilds
wepBuilds.text: Weapon builds are based on best (sometimes up to 7 forma on a single weapon) effort basis and done without rivens. Therefore it is also safe to say weapons are ranked without rivens.

frameBuilds.name: frameBuilds
frameBuilds.text: Frame builds are based on build goals that should be aspired to. The precise build differs from playstyle and preference and therefore can't be fixed. Nonetheless, future updates will include example builds.

dispute.name: dispute
dispute.text: If you have any issues with rankings/builds, please visit the Discord server to discuss about them.

dispo.name: disposition
dispo.text: indicates a weapon that has an unusually high riven disposition for its rank.

utubechannel.name: channel
utubechannel.text: All weapon tests on the Curator's Youtube Channel.

version: Warframe Patch 24.6.2.1 - Added Stradavar Prime, Tipedo Prime, and Korrudo. Updated latest Riven disposition. Updated Secura Penta, Knell, and Tysis. Added Frame ranking.
